Html:
Hi,

First off all thank you very much for this great work.
As I am trying to use the MimeParser functionality in SharePoint 2013 in an EMailEventReceiver I didn't just downloaded the whole source but instead just tried to use the ParseMessageRec Methode from the MailMessageMimeParser class (with all its dependent methods).

It works perfect to convert a SPEMailMessage to a System.Net.Mail.MailMessage. But as it seems it doesn`t get the ContentDisposition.Inline attribute of an Attachment (value is always false).
Basically I just need a way to get a grip off all inline elements, embedded in an html mail (which seems impossible from the SPEMailMessage object).
